00035 #ifndef HARPS_COMPORNENT_DISTOTION
00036 #define HARPS_COMPORNENT_DISTOTION
00037 
00038 #include <harps/utils.hpp>
00039 #include <harps/clock.hpp>
00040 #include <harps/buffer.hpp>
00041 #include <harps/note.hpp>
00042 #include <harps/normalize.hpp>
00043 #include <harps/config.hpp>
00044 
00045 namespace harps {
00046   namespace compornent {
00050     template<
00051       typename ModuleType,
00052       int _linear_begin,
00053       int _linear_end,
00054       int _flat_begin
00055     >
00056       class Distotion {
00057         public:
00058           enum {
00059             CACHE_SIZE = 1024
00060           };
00061 
00062           Distotion() : cache( cache_array + CACHE_SIZE ) {
00063             static const float linear_begin = static_cast< float >( _linear_begin ) / 1000.0f;
00064             static const float linear_end = static_cast< float >( _linear_end ) / 1000.0f;
00065             static const float flat_begin = static_cast< float >( _flat_begin ) / 1000.0f;
00066             static const int linear_begin_index = linear_begin / flat_begin * CACHE_SIZE;
00067             static const int linear_end_index = linear_end / flat_begin * CACHE_SIZE;
00068             static const float height = 1.0f / ( ( flat_begin + linear_end - linear_begin ) * 0.5f );
00069             int index;
00070             for( index = 0; index != linear_begin_index; index++ ) {
00071               float x = static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE;
00072               float y = x * height / linear_begin;
00073               cache[ index ] = x * y * 0.5f;
00074             }
00075             for( ; index != linear_end_index; index++ ) {
00076               float xl = static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE;
00077               float xh = static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE - linear_begin;
00078                cache[ index ] = ( xl + xh ) * height * 0.5f;
00079             }
00080             for( ; index != CACHE_SIZE; index++ ) {
00081               float x = flat_begin - static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE;
00082               float y = x * height / ( flat_begin - linear_end );
00083               cache[ index ] = 1.0f - x * y * 0.5f;
00084             }
00085 
00086             static const float linear_half_begin = linear_begin * 0.5f;
00087             static const float linear_half_end = ( linear_end + flat_begin ) * 0.5f;
00088             static const int linear_half_begin_index = linear_half_begin / flat_begin * CACHE_SIZE;
00089             static const int linear_half_end_index = linear_half_end / flat_begin * CACHE_SIZE;
00090             static const float half_height = 0.5f / ( ( flat_begin + linear_half_end - linear_half_begin ) * 0.5f );
00091 
00092             for( index = 0; index != linear_half_begin_index / 2; index++ ) {
00093               float x = static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE;
00094               float y = x * half_height / linear_half_begin;
00095               cache[ -index ] = -( x * y * 0.5f );
00096             }
00097             for( ; index != linear_half_end_index; index++ ) {
00098               float xl = static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE;
00099               float xh = static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE - linear_half_begin;
00100               cache[ -index ] = -( ( xl + xh ) * half_height * 0.5f );
00101             }
00102             for( ; index != CACHE_SIZE; index++ ) {
00103               float x = flat_begin - static_cast< float >( index ) * flat_begin / CACHE_SIZE;
00104               float y = x * half_height / ( flat_begin - linear_half_end );
00105               cache[ -index ] = -( 0.5f - x * y * 0.5f );
00106             }
00107           }
00108           template< typename SampleType >
00109             inline void operator()( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00110               static const float linear_begin = static_cast< float >( _linear_begin ) / 1000.0f;
00111               static const float linear_end = static_cast< float >( _linear_end ) / 1000.0f;
00112               static const float flat_begin = static_cast< float >( _flat_begin ) / 1000.0f;
00113               static const float negative_total = ( ( flat_begin + ( linear_end + flat_begin ) / 2 - linear_begin / 2 ) * 0.5f * 0.5f );
00114 
00115               source_module( _buffer, _clock, _note );
00116               int index;
00117               typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00118               for( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) {
00119                 if( fabsf( raw_buffer[ index ] ) < flat_begin )
00120                   raw_buffer[ index ] = cache[ static_cast< int >( raw_buffer[ index ] / flat_begin * CACHE_SIZE ) ];
00121                 else if( raw_buffer[ index ] > 0.0f )
00122                   raw_buffer[ index ] = 1.0f;
00123                 else
00124                   raw_buffer[ index ] = -0.5f;
00125               }
00126             }
00127         private:
00128           float cache_array[ CACHE_SIZE * 2 ];
00129           float * const cache;
00130           ModuleType source_module;
00131       };
00132   }
00133 }
00134 
00135 #endif
